Question
========

What was the largest difference in the monthly average temperatures for Sao Paulo and Rio de Janeiro?

Solution
========

We find that the answer is 5.44 degree Celsius using the following R code:
```{r, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
Temperature %>%
  mutate( Difference = abs( SaoPaulo - Rio ) ) %>%
  summarise( "Maximum Difference" = max( Difference, na.rm = TRUE ) )
```
